attributes.action: allow people to freely cancel mobile phone contracts if not happy with the service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we believe mobile providers, should not charge to cancel a contract once customers say they are not happy with the service. at the moment telecommunications companies are providing what can only be described as a lower than agreed service at an over the top cost.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
